author: Mehera Bonner
title: Watch Rihanna in Bates Motel - Rihanna Reenacts Psycho Scene in Bates Motel Trailer
text: By Mehera Bonner Jan 31, 2017 If your life-long wish was for Rihanna to don a velvet cape and make a random cameo in Bates Motel , the teen drama based on Psycho , then said wish is about to come true. Oh, happy day! A&E Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The singer/icon/living legend appears in the show's new teaser trailer, and it looks like she'll be assuming the role of "unlucky lady who gets murdered in the shower"â€”originally played by Janet Leigh. You know, her: Most Popular What a time to be alive! Watch the trailer below, and tune into Bates Motel Season 5 February 20 on A&E.
